@/02-example-configuration-test.description: Patch to test configuration of sensor. Run in debugger.

ryIKz08Ro.description: Heater setting. Options: no heater = 00h, high heat 1s = 01h, high heat 100ms = 02h, medium heat 1s = 03h, medium heat 100ms = 04h, low heat 1s = 05h, low heat 100ms = 06h.
ryIKz08Ro.label: Heat

H1Xwzg-B46.label: Heat

@/01-example-hygrometer-thermometer.description: Patch to test the hygrometer-thermometer node. Run in debugger.

BkAzhbSN6.label: Heat
BkAzhbSN6.description: Heater setting. Options: no heater = 00h, high heat 1s = 01h, high heat 100ms = 02h, medium heat 1s = 03h, medium heat 100ms = 04h, low heat 1s = 05h, low heat 100ms = 06h.

Hy1y0bBVp.label: Reset
Hy1y0bBVp.description: Performs a soft reset of the sensor to put it into a known state.

@/hygrometer-thermometer.description: Combines low level nodes to create a simple to use hygrometer and thermometer.

@/reset.description: Performs a soft reset of the sensor to put it into a known state.

@/03-example-measure-read-time.description: Patch to demonstrate how heater and precision settings affect time required to read temperature and relative humidity. Run in debugger.

description: SHT4x relative humidity and temperature sensor. Tested using an SHT40 device. Wraps https://github.com/adafruit/Adafruit_SHT4X
name: sht4x
